definition: Hainan Province, in South China Sea, abbr. 瓊|琼[Qiong2], capital Haikou 海口
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
to save/to economize/to do without/to omit/to leave out/province/(archaic) central government department
to inspect/to examine/to be aware/to pay a visit (to one's parents or elders)

sentences.english: Dalong Water Control Project is a key project in Hainan Province.
sentences.chinese: 大隆水利枢纽工程是海南省的重点工程。

sentences.english: The Hainan example represents the first province-wide spatial planning.
sentences.chinese: 海南省是全国第一个开展省域空间规划的改革试点。

sentences.english: The Daguangba project is the largest hydro project in Hainan Province.
sentences.chinese: 大广坝水利水电枢纽是海南省最大的水电工程。

sentences.english: Haikou, the capital of Hainan Province, is in the northeast of the island.
sentences.chinese: 海口市是海南省省会，它位于海南岛的东北部。

sentences.english: Hainan is the only tropical island province in China dominated by tropical sceneries.
sentences.chinese: 海南省是我国唯一的热带海岛省份，以热带风光为主。

sentences.english: Granite is widely distributed in Bawangling Hill area, Hainan Province.
sentences.chinese: 海南省坝王岭地区花岗岩分布广泛。

sentences.english: River is located in the eastern part of Hainan Island Hainan Province, China.
sentences.chinese: 万泉河位于中国海南省海南岛东部。

sentences.english: It is located at the west of Guoxing road.
sentences.chinese: 学校位于国兴大道西侧，毗邻海南省政府新办公大楼。

sentences.english: Hainan province is offshore across from the Leizhou Peninsula.
sentences.chinese: 其雷州半岛与海南省隔海相望。

sentences.english: Since Hainan province established, the rural residents' consumption has continued lowly.
sentences.chinese: 建省以来，海南省农村居民消费持续偏低。

sentences.english: The Pavilion is organised by CCPIT Hainan.
To the West of Hainan is the Gulf of Tonkin .
sentences.chinese: 海南省的西部是北部湾。

definition: Haikou prefecture-level city and capital of Hainan Province 海南省[Hai3 nan2 Sheng3]

Hainan Province, in the South China Sea, short name 瓊|琼[Qiong2], capital Haikou 海口/Hainan Island/Hainan District of Wuhai City 烏海市|乌海市[Wu1 hai3 Shi4], Inner Mongolia/Hainan Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture 海南藏族自治州[Hai3 nan2 Zang4 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Qinghai
